net.oneandone.mork.semantics

Class Ag

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.oneandone.mork.semantics.Ag

  • public class Ag
extends Object
    Attribute grammar, supports >=0 synthesized and inherited attributes.

      • getAttributes

        public void getAttributes(int symbol,
                 Set<Attribute> internal,
                 Set<Attribute> synthesized,
                 Set<Attribute> inherited)
        Besides the classic synthesized and inherited attributes, I have internal attributes. Internal attributes are computed when creating the node, a better name might be 'initial'.
